name: Mighty Wizzard Hero Conquest: The Lens of Truth
name_original: Mighty Wizzard Hero Conquest: The Lens of Truth
description:
In a world filled with magic and wonder, there are those who wish to destroy and ruin all the good in the world. ... and so they did. Now instead of joy and laughs its now a place of torment and despair.

It now comes to the Mighty Wizzard Hero to strike out on a new adventure of fun and all things good. Join in the Mighty Wizzard Hero in his Conquest to save the world! In a story too epic, awesome, and epic for this world!

So its a game instead.
